name: listRatePlanForHotelForRatePlanId
description:
Returns a single rate plan available for you for a hotel.

Rate plans are products the hotel is offering. They typically consist of a combination of restrictiveness in case of cancellations or changes, the time they're bookable, minimum or maximum length of stay restrictions (e.g. week-long bookings), included components like breakfast or dinner and/or the conditions under which the room can be sold (e.g. private rates that can only be offered and sold to a closed user group behind login).

Examples of rate plans:

* Non-refundable room rate that includes breakfast
* Room-only rate with free cancellation up to 14 days before arrival

This endpoint returns a singular available rate plan.

hotelId.description: The uuid of hotel for which rate plans are being fetched.

updatedAt.description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.

size.description: Number of rate plans returned on a given page (pagination).

offset.description: Offset from the first rate plan in the result (for pagination).

start.description: Start date of the considered time window for the returned rate plan.

end.description: Start date of the considered time window for the returned rate plan.

roomTypeId.description: The uuid of room for which rate plans are being fetched.

$block: Rate plan encapsulates rates given a set of internal conditions like cancellation policy or meal plan.

$ul: **adjustments**: A list of adjustments that could apply to this rate.
**conditions**: Conditions described by the rate plan.
**cancellationPolicy**: Type of cancellation policy applicable to the rate
**description**: Human-readable summary describing this rate plan.
**hotelId**: The unique identifier of the hotel this rate plan is available for.
**ratePlanId**: The integer identifier of this rate plan.
**restrictions**: Restrictions that apply to this rate plan.
**lengthOfStay**: Determines the length of stay in nights for which this rate plan can be booked.
**max**: The maximum number of nights (inclusive) a guest can stay to be eligible for this rate plan.
**min**: The minimum number of nights (inclusive) a guest has to stay to be eligible for this rate plan.
**roomTypes**: A list of room types this rate plan is bookable for.
**code**: Error code for you to use programatically, for error logging and debugging.

**message**: Error message intended to aid developers in debugging issues. We strongly advise against displaying this information publicly to your guests as it **might contain sensitive implementation details**.
